task_summary: Detect the fridge and its handle, approach and grasp the handle, pull to open the hinged fridge door, verify it is open, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A PR2 robot operates in a cluttered kitchenette. The goal is to open a standard hinged fridge door. The robot must perceive the fridge and handle, align precisely, grasp with appropriate force, and perform an opening motion using a container-level primitive. After actuation, it verifies the door state and retreats to a safe distance, leaving the opening unobstructed. Timing is moderate; accuracy in alignment and stable grasp on the handle are crucial to avoid slipping or scraping nearby drawers.
preconditions: Fridge and handle are within the workspace.
No blocking obstacles preventing door swing.
Robot has free end-effector and sufficient reach.
stepwise_plan: Approach and align to the handle at tight tolerance.
Execute door opening primitive for a hinged door.
success_criteria: Fridge door visibly open beyond initial closed pose.
Handle grasp is stable during motion.
Robot ends in a safe, retracted pose.
failure_and_recovery: Grasp slip → reopen gripper and retry grasp.
Door stuck → slightly re-approach and re-open with longer timeout.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the door-open condition is satisfied and the robot has retreated to a safe distance.

frame_3.now_evidence: First clear grasping interaction with the handle; alignment looks complete.
frame_3.predicts_next: Opening actuation expected immediately after grasp.

node_specs.description: Detect the fridge door in the scene.
Detect the fridge handle for grasping.
Verify handle is visible before approach.
Approach and align the end-effector to the handle.
Close gripper to grasp the handle.
Execute opening primitive for a hinged door.
Check if the fridge door is open.
Back away from the opened door.

recovery_strategy: Increase timeout_ms for OpenContainer and slightly re-approach
Abort and Retreat if force thresholds indicate collision (out of scope)
assumptions: Frames show a hinged fridge door; instruction matches visuals.
Handle is graspable by the PR2 gripper.
No human interference and free swing space for the door.

expected_success_criteria: Retreat executed after door is open
